attribute.value: select khzbdh as key,khzbmc as value from khfa_khzb_jg

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核年份输入错误，格式应该是:yyyy!' where f_java_rule_date(t.khnf,'yyyy')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核年份输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.khnf)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'机构代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jgdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'机构代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_jg j where rtrim(t.jgdh)=rtrim(j.jgdh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error= t.error||'机构代号检查不通过,没有权限!' where not exists(select 1 from table(fn_getsjjg_java_qx($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx where qx.jgdh=t.jgdh) and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核指标名称输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.khzbmc)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，只能输入:17位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.jhz,17,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'力争值输入错误，只能输入:17位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.lzz)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.lzz,17,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'力争值输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.lzz)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set error=error||cast(t.khnf as varchar(4))||'年份时间维度未初始化，请通知管理员后，再行导入！' where not exists ( select 1 from csb_sjw sjw where cast(t.khnf||'0101' as integer)=sjw.tjrq) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set error=error||'机构代号和名称必须一致' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_jg jg where t.jgdh=jg.jgdh and jg.jgmc=t.jgmc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set error=error||'考核指标名称不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from khfa_khzb_jg khzb where khzb.khzbmc=t.khzbmc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists( select 1 from YJZB_JGNJH tar ,KHFA_KHZB_JG KHFA_KHZB_JG0,KHDX_JG KHDX_JG1 where 1=1 and cast(t.khnf as DECIMAL(31,0))=tar.KHNF and t.khzbmc=KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBMC and KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBDH=tar.KHZBDH and t.jgdh=KHDX_JG1.JGDH and KHDX_JG1.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgnjhdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select khnf,khzbmc,jgdh from jgnjhdr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by khnf,khzbmc,jgdh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.khnf=dr.khnf and t.khzbmc=dr.khzbmc and t.jgdh=dr.jgdh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE jgnjhdr_temp ( khnf varchar(100) , jgdh varchar(100) , jgmc varchar(100) , khzbmc varchar(100) , jhz varchar(100) , lzz varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgnjhdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgnjhdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khnf,jgdh,jgmc,khzbmc,jhz,lzz,khdxdh,error from jgnjhdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, khnf,jgdh,jgmc,khzbmc,jhz,lzz,khdxdh,error from jgnjhdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khnf,jgdh,jgmc,khzbmc,jhz,lzz,khdxdh,error from jgnjhdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into YJZB_JGNJH(KHNF,KHZBDH,KHDXDH,JHZ,LZZ) select cast (t.khnf as DECIMAL(31,0)),KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBDH,KHDX_JG1.KHDXDH, cast (t.jhz as DECIMAL(25,4)), cast (t.lzz as DECIMAL(25,4)) from jgnjhdr_temp t ,KHFA_KHZB_JG KHFA_KHZB_JG0,KHDX_JG KHDX_JG1 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBMC=cast (t.khzbmc as VARCHAR(100)) and KHDX_JG1.JGDH=cast (t.jgdh as VARCHAR(10))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from YJZB_JGNJH tar where exists(select 1 from jgnjhdr_temp t ,KHFA_KHZB_JG KHFA_KHZB_JG0,KHDX_JG KHDX_JG1 where 1=1 and cast(t.khnf as DECIMAL(31,0))=tar.KHNF and t.khzbmc=KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBMC and KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBDH=tar.KHZBDH and t.jgdh=KHDX_JG1.JGDH and KHDX_JG1.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khzbdh as key,khzbmc as value from khfa_khzb_jg
